post.text: This is big—we just launched a one-of-a-kind mobile app, and you get to be one of the first to try it! Download it today to complete your daily challenges, collect stars, and decorate your own digital campaign headquarters. Test your knowledge and see how you stack up against friends and supporters across the country—all while doing your part to help elect Hillary: http://apple.co/2aEvUwU

comment.author: Zachary
comment.text: Hillary for the love of God stop drinking!!! Your pandering is psychotic, you're losing touch with reality and becoming paranoid!!! You look old and tired!!! Put the vodka bottle down and go to bed!!! VOTE TRUMP MAKE AMERICA GREAT AGAIN !!!

replies.author: Zachary
replies.text: Not me .... Hilary the crook is a long time drunk and so is Slick Willy the rapist .........GooooTrump #TrumpTrain #NeverCrookedHillary

replies.author: Kevin
replies.text: sweetheart, it sounds like you're inebriated. I know it's national tequila day and all, but don't come for the next POTUS. Trump is a Neanderthal and so are you.

replies.author: Courtney
replies.text: And tell us Zachary, how is that Trump does not pander?

replies.author: Zachary
replies.text: Crooked Hillary picks Tim Kaine.." because he has foreign affairs experience." Wait...isn't that what SHE is supposed to be known for, as a former SOSOTUS.
